Uses of Package
org.magnos.task

Classes in org.magnos.task used by org.magnos.task
Task
          A single action that can be executed synchronously or asynchronously.
TaskCollection
          A collection of tasks when executed will return a list of results.
TaskEventHandler
          An event handler that can process any type of task.
TaskFork
          A clone of a task used for forking.
TaskListener
          A listener notified on the events of task.
TaskService
          A service which can process any type of task.
